Segment.name: W27
Segment.comment: To specify details of the transportation equipment and carrier routing details

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: Routing
Field.comment: Free-form description of the routing or requested routing for shipment, or the originating carrier's identity

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: EquipmentDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: ShipmentOrderStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of an order or shipment or the disposition of any difference between the quantity ordered and the quantity shipped for a line item or transaction

Field.name: SpecialHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code specifying special transportation handling instructions

Field.name: CarrierRouteChangeReasonCode
Field.comment: Code reflecting reason a requested carrier or route was changed

SyntaxNote.name: R0203
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of W2702 or W2703 is required.
